segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I feel a chill down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing wildly, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor woman is oblivious, standing right in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if she slips and falls hard?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those childrenâ€” the boy on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back; he could tumble and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, so close to the edge of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies spilling out might make them distracted and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage could ruin the whole floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just know something terrible is about to happen here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is racing just watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR
